TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit MethodInfo extends System.Reflection.MethodBase implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._MethodInfo
Public MustInherit Class MethodInfo Inherits MethodBase Implements _MethodInfo
public ref class MethodInfo abstract : System::Reflection::MethodBase, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_MethodInfo
type MethodInfo = class inherit MethodBase interface _MethodInfo

summary.span: 发现方法的属性并提供对方法元数据的访问。

span.span: Discovers the attributes of a method and provides access to method metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示一种类型的方法。The class represents a method of a type. 可以使用对象以获取有关该对象表示的方法的信息，并调用该方法。You can use a object to obtain information about the method that the object represents and to invoke the method. 例如:For example: - 您可以通过检索的值来确定方法的可见性， ， ，和属性。You can determine the method's visibility by retrieving the values of the , , , and properties. - 你可以发现哪些属性应用于该方法通过检索的值属性或调用方法。You can discover what attributes are applied to the method by retrieving the value of the property or calling the method. - 该方法是泛型方法，一种开放构造泛型方法，还是已关闭通过检索的值来构造泛型方法，可以确定和属性。You can determine whether the method is a generic method, an open constructed generic method, or a closed constructed generic method, by retrieving the values of the and properties. - 你可以获取有关方法的参数的信息，并返回类型从方法和， ，和属性。You can get information about the method's parameters and return type from the method and the , , and properties. - 在执行方法的类实例通过调用方法。You can execute a method on a class instance by calling the method. - 可以实例化对象，表示来自一个表示通过调用泛型方法定义构造泛型方法方法。You can instantiate a object that represents a constructed generic method from one that represents a generic method definition by calling the method. 可以实例化实例通过调用或方法，或通过调用方法表示泛型方法定义的对象。You can instantiate a instances by calling the or method, or by calling the method of a object that represents a generic method definition. 有关特定于泛型方法的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 有关泛型反射中使用其他术语的固定条件列表，请参阅属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，为直接或间接的基类（用该实例表示的方法首先在此类中声明）上的方法返回 对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the object for the method on the direct or indirect base class in which the method represented by this instance was first declared.

returns.span: 表示此方法第一个实现的 对象。

span.span: A object for the first implementation of this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在类层次结构中返回指定的方法的第一个定义。The method returns the first definition of the specified method in the class hierarchy. 您可以确定在其的方法的第一个定义位于通过检索的值类型属性对返回对象。You can determine the type on which the first definition of the method is found by retrieving the value of the property on the returned object. 方法的行为，如下所示：The method behaves as follows: - 如果当前对象表示的接口实现，方法返回当前对象。If the current object represents an interface implementation, the method returns the current object. - 如果当前对象表示重写虚拟基类中的定义的方法方法将返回表示虚拟定义的对象。If the current object represents a method that overrides a virtual definition in a base class, the method returns a object that represents the virtual definition. - 如果当前对象表示使用指定的方法`new`C# 中的关键字或`Shadows`在 Visual Basic 中的关键字 (如`newslot`，如中所述[通用类型系统](~/docs/standard/base-types/common-type-system.md))， 方法返回当前对象。If the current object represents a method that is specified with the `new` keyword in C# or the `Shadows` keyword in Visual Basic (as in `newslot`, as described in [Common Type System](~/docs/standard/base-types/common-type-system.md)), the method returns the current object. - 如果当前对象表示继承的方法 （即，当前方法不提供其自己的实现），方法将返回表示的类层次结构中的最小方法的对象。If the current object represents an inherited method (that is, the current method does not provide its own implementation), the method returns a object that represents the lowest method in the class hierarchy. 例如，如果`Base.ToString`重写`Object.ToString`，并`Derived.ToString`重写`Base.ToString`，则调用方法对象，表示`Derived.ToString`返回表示的对象`Object.ToString`.For example, if `Base.ToString` overrides `Object.ToString`, and `Derived.ToString` overrides `Base.ToString`, calling the method on a object that represents `Derived.ToString` returns a object that represents `Object.ToString`. - 如果当前对象表示的方法的任何基类中不存在方法返回当前对象。If the current object represents a method that is not present in any base class, the method returns the current object. 您可以确定是否当前方法重写的基类中的方法通过调用方法。You can determine whether the current method overrides a method in a base class by calling the method. 下面的示例实现`IsOverride`方法就是如此。The following example implements an `IsOverride` method that does this. [!code-csharp[system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/cs/IsOverride1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/vb/IsOverride1.vb#2)] 若要调用`GetBaseDefinition`方法：To call the `GetBaseDefinition` method: 1. 获取对象，表示包含属性的类型 （类或结构）。Get a object that represents the type (the class or structure) that contains the property. 如果您正在使用的对象 （一种类型的实例），则可以调用其方法。If you are working with an object (an instance of a type), you can call its method. 否则，可以使用C#运算符或 Visual Basic [GetType](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator.md)运算符，如示例说明了。Otherwise, you can use the C# operator or the Visual Basic [GetType](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator.md) operator, as the example illustrates. 2. 获取对象，表示您感兴趣的方法。Get a object that represents the method in which you're interested. 您可以执行此操作通过获取数组中的所有方法方法，然后循环访问元素数组，或者您可以检索对象，表示该方法直接通过调用方法并指定方法名称。You can do this by getting an array of all methods from the method and then iterating the elements in the array, or you can retrieve the object that represents the method directly by calling the method and specifying the method name. 3. 调用方法获取的值表示基方法定义的对象。Call the method to get the value of the object that represents the base method definition. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的行为方法。The following example demonstrates the behavior of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MethodInfo.GetBaseDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/cs/getbasedefinition1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MethodInfo.GetBaseDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/vb/getbasedefinition1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回 对象的数组，这些对象表示泛型方法的类型实参或泛型方法定义的类型形参。

span.span: Returns an array of objects that represent the type arguments of a generic method or the type parameters of a generic method definition.

returns.span: 对象的数组，这些对象表示泛型方法的类型变量或泛型方法定义的类型参数。

span.span: An array of objects that represent the type arguments of a generic method or the type parameters of a generic method definition.

returns.span: 如果当前方法不是泛型方法，则返回空数组。

span.span: Returns an empty array if the current method is not a generic method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回数组的元素是泛型方法的类型参数的列表中出现的顺序。The elements of the returned array are in the order in which they appear in the list of type parameters for the generic method. - 如果当前方法是封闭式构造的方法 (即属性返回`false`)，返回的数组方法包含已分配给泛型方法的泛型类型参数的类型定义。If the current method is a closed constructed method (that is, the property returns `false`), the array returned by the method contains the types that have been assigned to the generic type parameters of the generic method definition. - 如果当前方法是泛型方法定义，该数组包含类型参数。If the current method is a generic method definition, the array contains the type parameters. - 如果当前方法是打开的构造的方法 (即属性返回`true`) 中对某些类型参数和类型分配了哪些特定类型的封闭泛型类型参数已分配给其他类型参数，该数组包含类型和类型参数。If the current method is an open constructed method (that is, the property returns `true`) in which specific types have been assigned to some type parameters and type parameters of enclosing generic types have been assigned to other type parameters, the array contains both types and type parameters. 使用属性来区分它们。Use the property to tell them apart. 此方案的演示，请参阅的代码示例属性。For a demonstration of this scenario, see the code example for the property. 有关特定于泛型方法的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 有关泛型反射中使用其他术语的固定条件列表，请参阅属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取泛型方法的类型参数，并显示它们。The following code example shows how to get the type arguments of a generic method and display them. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供方法。This example is part of a larger example provided for the method. [!code-cpp[MethodInfo.Generics#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/cpp/source.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[MethodInfo.Generics#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[MethodInfo.Generics#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/VB/source.vb#8)]

summary.span: 返回一个 对象，该对象表示可从其构造当前方法的泛型方法定义。

span.span: Returns a object that represents a generic method definition from which the current method can be constructed.

returns.span: 一个 对象，表示可从其构造当前方法的泛型方法定义。

span.span: A object representing a generic method definition from which the current method can be constructed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型方法定义是可从其构造方法的模板。A generic method definition is a template from which methods can be constructed. 例如，从泛型方法定义`T M(T t)`（以 C# 语法;`Function M(Of T)(ByVal tVal As T) As T`在 Visual Basic 中) 可以构造和调用方法`int M(int t)`(`Function M(Of Integer)(ByVal tVal As Integer) As Integer`在 Visual Basic 中)。For example, from the generic method definition `T M(T t)` (expressed in C# syntax; `Function M(Of T)(ByVal tVal As T) As T` in Visual Basic) you can construct and invoke the method `int M(int t)` (`Function M(Of Integer)(ByVal tVal As Integer) As Integer` in Visual Basic). 给定对象表示此构造方法，方法返回的泛型方法定义。Given a object representing this constructed method, the method returns the generic method definition. 如果在同一个泛型方法定义中，创建了两种构造的方法方法将返回相同这两种方法的对象。If two constructed methods are created from the same generic method definition, the method returns the same object for both methods. 如果您调用上已表示泛型方法定义，则返回当前。If you call on a that already represents a generic method definition, it returns the current . 如果泛型方法定义包括声明类型的泛型参数，将有一个泛型方法定义特定于每个构造的类型。If a generic method definition includes generic parameters of the declaring type, there will be a generic method definition specific to each constructed type. 例如，请考虑以下C#，Visual Basic 和C++代码：For example, consider the following C#, Visual Basic, and C++ code: ``` class B {} class C { public B M() {...}} Class B(Of U, V) End Class Class C(Of T) Public Function M(Of S)() As B(Of T, S) ... End Function End Class generic ref class B {}; generic ref class C { public: generic B^ M() {...}; }; ``` 中的构造类型`C`(`C(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，泛型方法`M`返回`B`。In the constructed type `C` (`C(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the generic method `M` returns `B`. 在开放类型`C`，`M`返回`B`。In the open type `C`, `M` returns `B`. 在这两种情况下，属性返回`true`有关表示`M`，因此都可以调用对象。In both cases, the property returns `true` for the that represents `M`, so can be called on both objects. 在构造类型的调用结果的情况下是，可以调用。In the case of the constructed type, the result of calling is a that can be invoked. 在开放类型的情况下返回的不能调用。In the case of the open type, the returned by cannot be invoked. 有关特定于泛型方法的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 有关泛型反射中使用其他术语的固定条件列表，请参阅属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了具有一个泛型方法和获取所需的代码的类对于方法，绑定的方法类型参数，并在重新获得原始的泛型类型定义绑定的方法。The following code example shows a class with a generic method and the code required to obtain a for the method, bind the method to type arguments, and get the original generic type definition back from the bound method. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供方法。This example is part of a larger example provided for the method. [!code-cpp[MethodInfo.Generics#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodInfo.Generics#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodInfo.Generics#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodInfo.Generics#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/cpp/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[MethodInfo.Generics#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MethodInfo.Generics#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/VB/source.vb#3)] [!code-cpp[MethodInfo.Generics#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodInfo.Generics#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodInfo.Generics#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/VB/source.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示此成员是方法。

span.span: Gets a value indicating that this member is a method.

value.span: 一个 值，指示此成员是方法。

span.span: A value indicating that this member is a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将替代。This property overrides . 因此，检查一系列对象，例如，返回的数组-属性返回仅当给定的成员是一种方法。Therefore, when you examine a set of objects - for example, the array returned by - the property returns only when a given member is a method. 若要获取`MemberType`属性，首先获取类`Type`。To get the `MemberType` property, first get the class `Type`. 从`Type`，获取`MethodInfo`。From the `Type`, get the `MethodInfo`. 从`MethodInfo`，获取`MemberType`。From the `MethodInfo`, get the `MemberType`. ## Examples 下面的示例显示指定的成员的类型。The following example displays the type of the specified member. [!code-cpp[Classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象包含有关方法的返回类型的信息（例如返回类型是否具有自定义修饰符）。

span.span: Gets a object that contains information about the return type of the method, such as whether the return type has custom modifiers.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含有关返回类型的信息。

span.span: A object that contains information about the return type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编译器设计人员可以使用对象返回的此属性以发现是否自定义修饰符，如，已应用于返回类型。Compiler designers can use the object returned by this property to discover whether custom modifiers, such as , have been applied to the return type.

span.span: This method is not implemented.

summary.span: 获取此方法的返回类型。

span.span: Gets the return type of this method.
The return type of this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取的返回类型属性，请先获取类`Type`。To get the return type property, first get the class `Type`. 从`Type`，获取`MethodInfo`。From the `Type`, get the `MethodInfo`. 从`MethodInfo`，获取`ReturnType`。From the `MethodInfo`, get the `ReturnType`. ## Examples 以下示例显示指定方法的返回类型。The following example displays the return type of the specified method. [!code-cpp[Classic MethodInfo.ReturnType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodInfo.ReturnType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MethodInfo.ReturnType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodInfo.ReturnType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MethodInfo.ReturnType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodInfo.ReturnType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
